story.title: AFP Features and Focus Advisory
story.summary: Features Editors: Paris: Kate Millar +33 1 4041 4636Hong Kong: Alice Philipson +852 2829 6211Twitter: @AFPfeature We are offering the following features:+ Honey healing wounds of war in Colombian village+ How 'Heidi' conquered Japan, sparking an anime revolutionColombia-conflict-environment-bees,FEATURECHENGUE, ColombiaCovered from head to toe in a protective suit, Yina Ortiz peers through a veil to check in on her beehive, one of hundreds that form a lifeline for her remote village, helping...

xmlText.p: We are offering the following features:
+ Honey healing wounds of war in Colombian village
+ How 'Heidi' conquered Japan, sparking an anime revolution

Covered from head to toe in a protective suit, Yina Ortiz peers through a veil to check in on her beehive, one of hundreds that form a lifeline for her remote village, helping to heal the wounds of one of the Colombian conflict's most brutal atrocities.
800 words by Diego Legrand. Pictures by Juan Barreto and Video by Alberto Gonzalez
Heidi and Super Mario may not seem to have much in common but anime and video game aficionados will detect the signature style of Japanese character designer Yoichi Kotabe in both.
700 words by Nathalie Olof-Ors. Pictures by Fabrice Coffrini
